All, I have had a member as me about a kanteisho from a group known as 
the KINKI NIHONTO GAKKAI. The paper is signed by a Mr KORYU TERAMINE ( 
Teramune ? ) Does anyone have any information on this group ?, is it a 
Shop perhaps ?.

Cheers

Rich Turner
